attributes.action: ensure that those Israelis guilty of war crimes in Gaza are brought to justice at the Internationial Criminal Court in the Hague
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am an ordinary British citizen who wishes to press charges against the Israeli government and its military personnel for war crimes against the Palestinian people.  I am sure lots of other British people feel the same way, and want Gordon Brown to expel the Israeli ambassador from Britain, and to instigate proceedings against Israel. If you agree, please sign below.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
